kit.leader_skill: "Power Beyond Super Saiyan" or "Movie Heroes" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional Ki +1 and HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who also belong to the "Kamehameha" Category

super_attack.name: Divine Dance of Fire (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF; Causes colossal damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Super Saiyan God Duo
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's entry: (Once) Damage reduction rate 77% up and launches an additional Super Attack for 1 turn; (Once) Ki +2, ATK & DEF 100% up and guards all attacks for 7 turns; (Once) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) Receives an additional Ki +2 per Type Ki Sphere obtained; For every Ki Sphere obtained: ATK & DEF 10% up (up to 77%); For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: Chance of performing a critical hit 10% up; When attacking with 17 or more Ki: Launches an additional Super Attack; When attacking with 20 or more Ki: Attacks are effective against all Types; Launches an additional Super Attack

kit.leader_skill: "Power Beyond Super Saiyan" or "Movie Heroes" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional Ki +1 and HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who also belong to the "Kamehameha" Category

super_attack.name: Divine Fang of Azure Light (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Massively raises ATK and; greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy

ultra_super_attack.name: Kamehameha & Galick Gun (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Massively raises ATK & DEF for 4 turns; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; Disables enemy's action once; In the turn

passive_skill.name: Super Saiyan Blue Transformation!
passive_skill.effect: (Once) Damage reduction rate 77% up for 1 turn; (Forever) ATK & DEF 300% up; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained; (Forever) Attacks are effective against all Types; (Forever) Guards all attacks; (Forever) High chance of performing a critical hit; (Forever) Medium chance of evading enemy's attack; (Forever) Changes Ki Spheres: INT to Rainbow; For 4 turns from the character's entry turn: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres; For every Ki Sphere obtained: ATK & DEF 10% up (up to 100%); For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up; 7 or more Ki Spheres obtained: Launches an additional Super Attack; When attacking with 20 or more Ki: Launches an additional Super Attack; When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki: ATK 50% up; When attacking: (Once) Performs a critical hit and launches an additional Super Attack when the enemy's HP is 50% or more; When receiving an attack: (Once) Evades enemy's attack when HP is 50% or less

lines.text: Damage reduction rate 77% up for 1 turn
ATK & DEF 300% up
Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained
Attacks are effective against all Types
Guards all attacks
High chance of performing a critical hit
Medium chance of evading enemy's attack
Changes Ki Spheres: INT to Rainbow
Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (INT excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres
lines.context: For 4 turns from the character's entry turn

lines.text: ATK & DEF 10% up (up to 100%)
lines.context: For every Ki Sphere obtained

lines.text: Chance of performing a critical hit & chance of evading enemy's attack 10% up
lines.context: For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained

lines.text: Launches an additional Super Attack
lines.context: 7 or more Ki Spheres obtained

lines.text: Launches an additional Super Attack
lines.context: When attacking with 20 or more Ki

lines.text: ATK 50% up
lines.context: When activating the Active Skill or when attacking with 24 Ki

lines.text: Performs a critical hit and launches an additional Super Attack when the enemy's HP is 50% or more
lines.context: When attacking

lines.text: Evades enemy's attack when HP is 50% or less
lines.context: When receiving an attack

active_skill.name: Fusion
active_skill.effect: Causes ultimate damage to enemy; Within the turn activated,; all attacks become critical hits
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when HP is 50% or less Or when facing only 1 enemy Whose HP is 50% or less (once only)
